name: Survival Training and Escape Methods
description: Essential survival techniques for urban and rural environments, including evasion, shelter-building, and escape strategies.

cards.title: Urban and Wilderness Survival Basics
cards.description: Developing skills to stay alive in both natural and urban environments.
bulletpoints: Identifying and securing food, water, and shelter.
Navigating urban and wilderness terrain safely.
Using environmental resources for survival advantages.
cards.summaryText: Covers dual-environment survival planning, acquisition of essentials, and leveraging terrain assets.

cards.title: Escape and Evasion Strategies
cards.description: Tactics for avoiding capture and escaping pursuit in hostile environments.
bulletpoints: Breaking restraints and escaping from containment.
Surviving in extreme conditions with minimal resources.
cards.summaryText: Provides evasion drills, restraint breaks, and austere survival tactics to beat pursuit.

cards.title: Improvised Shelter and Resource Gathering
cards.description: Creating safe havens and gathering necessary resources for long-term survival.
bulletpoints: Building shelters in urban and wilderness settings.
Using stealth and camouflage to stay undetected.
cards.summaryText: Guides stealth shelter builds, clandestine resource harvests, and low-signature living.
